conclusion: Liquid will flow out from A, B, C, and D and pass through baffles to reach containers E, F, or G.

Container E is at the bottom left, container F is in the middle, and container G is at the bottom right.
The orange baffle is slanted to the right and positioned below points A and B.
The light blue baffle is slanted to the left and positioned below the orange baffle.
The gray baffle is slanted to the left and positioned below point C.
The red baffle is slanted to the right and positioned below the gray baffle.
The blue baffle is slanted to the left and positioned below point D.

conclusion: Liquid from A flows into container E.
